passive.name: Steadfast
passive.description: ecomes a boosted attack every third attack, dealing extra damage and knocking enemies into the air.

basic attack.description: Every third attack knocks enemies toward the Pokemon.

base.name: Quick Attack
base.description: Has the user lunge forward at a speed that makes them almost invisible, dealing damage to opposing Pokemon they come in contact with.

upgrade.description: Increases Attack for a short time.

upgrades.name: Extreme Speed
upgrades.description: Attacks using lightning force. The waiting time of this move is reset when opponent Pokemon with an “Extreme Speed Mark” are hit.

upgrade.description: The user becomes immune to hindrances while charging power.

upgrades.name: Power-Up Punch
upgrades.description: Charges power before unleashing a powerful attack, dealing damage to opposing Pokemon and {{shoving|knockback}} them when it hits. Also changes the user's next basic attack into a boosted attack.

base.name: Meteor Mash
base.description: Blasts forward with a punch like a comet, dealing damage to opposing Pokemon and shoving them.

upgrade.description: Resets all of the user's move cooldown when this move is used a second time.

upgrades.name: Bone Rush
upgrades.description: Performs a combo attack with a bone, dealing multiple damaging blows to opposing Pokemon and leaving them {{unable to act|stun}} for a short time. The final attack sends the bone flying. If used again, the move has the user rush to the location of the bone.

upgrade.description: When this move is used, it grants the user a shield. While using this move, the user becomes immune to hindrances.

upgrades.name: Close Combat
upgrades.description: Unleashes a combo attack, dealing multiple blows to opposing Pokemon and {{shoving|knockback and stun}} them.

unite.name: Aura Cannon
unite.description: Focuses its entire body, then releases a wave attack and attaches an “Extreme Speed mark” to enemy Pokemon hit.
